title: Richard Hasen: "Cheap Speech"
description: Michael speaks with University of California-Irvine Law Professor Rick Hasen, author of "Cheap Speech: How Disinformation Poisons Our Politics―and How to Cure It." Original air date 5 April 2022. The book was published on 8 March 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Rick Hasen)
